html: Even reading an e-book counts as reading. It isn't the device, it is what's happening in your mind. Reading triggers your imagination. Videos do not.
text: Even reading an e-book counts as reading. It isn't the device, it is what's happening in your mind. Reading triggers your imagination. Videos do not.

html: Just because I want to have more books and less screen doesn't mean I don't like the screen. Saying but you are typing this on a screen is also so silly. We don't need to polarise every darn thing in the world and make it into this vs that. Love screen. Love books.
text: Just because I want to have more books and less screen doesn't mean I don't like the screen. Saying but you are typing this on a screen is also so silly. We don't need to polarise every darn thing in the world and make it into this vs that. Love screen. Love books.

html: The screen is important. It is fun too. I love it. But books also have their place and magic. It's not books vs screen, it is making them co-exist. Lifts and escalators are great. But you will always have and need stairs.
text: The screen is important. It is fun too. I love it. But books also have their place and magic. It's not books vs screen, it is making them co-exist. Lifts and escalators are great. But you will always have and need stairs.

html: We are in the middle of a screen invasion. In a phone obsessed world, I am trying to make people read. And I am ready for the challenge. Please, with folded hands, I request you to be understanding of this and be kind as I promote the new book coming weeks. Let’s make India read.
text: We are in the middle of a screen invasion. In a phone obsessed world, I am trying to make people read. And I am ready for the challenge. Please, with folded hands, I request you to be understanding of this and be kind as I promote the new book coming weeks. Let’s make India read.

html: While NRC in Assam needed, the criteria used are severely outdated with a 1971 cut-off (set in 1985). Since we are in 2018 now we can’t have a 47-year residency test. Need to reset date to say 2004 (which makes it 14yrs back as set in 1985.) Else we create more problems in Assam.
text: While NRC in Assam needed, the criteria used are severely outdated with a 1971 cut-off (set in 1985). Since we are in 2018 now we can’t have a 47-year residency test. Need to reset date to say 2004 (which makes it 14yrs back as set in 1985.) Else we create more problems in Assam.
